name: Croak-o-matic
description:
Croak-o-matic

Puzzle game developed under 48h for the GMTK2020 Game Jam, focused on planning and problem solving skills.

You'll be provided with the full map and the possibility to add "actions triggers" to the map. Then, hit play... and watch!

Controls:

Editor mode: Left click: select/place action Right click: delete action Mouse wheel: zoom WASD: move camera Click "play": start the run.

Running mode: 

Character will, by default, move to the right Hit "pause" to go back to edit.
